item.description:
Short Notice Hike - It looks like the weather will be nice this weekend so we might as well get a hike in. Total distance will only be about 4 to 6 miles. The Breakheart reservation is a short drive from Boston and has a network of up and down trails - no steep, long climbs. One hill toward the end of the hike has a nice view back towards Boston. Bring a lunch, snacks and water.

We will meet at 10am in front of the main building at the park entrance - just beyond the Kasabuski Rink. you can also call me on my cell 617-596-5579.

for directions and more info check out
http://www.mass.gov/d....

If anyone is coming from The Somerville/Cambridge area we can carpool. We can meet at the Dunkin Donuts In Union Sq, Somerville at 9:15am.
item.name: Breakheart Hike
